name: help-scout-mcp
description: Help Scout MCP server â€” search and summarize support tickets, manage conversations with full transcripts, create draft or published replies, browse and edit Docs articles, and generate email, chat, and happiness reports
long_description:
Help Scout integration for AI assistants.

**Core Features:**
- Advanced conversation search with query syntax
- Multi-status search across active/pending/closed conversations
- Inline transcripts for single-call ticket summarization
- Structured filtering by ticket number, assignee, customer, or folder
- Complete thread message retrieval with transcript format
- Conversation summaries with customer and staff messages
- Create draft or published replies with HTML formatting optimized for Help Scout
- Inbox discovery and server time utilities

**Optional Features** (require additional configuration):
- Full Docs API integration (articles, collections, categories)
- Complete Reports API (email, chat, phone, happiness, company)

**Security:**
- OAuth2 Client Credentials authentication
- Draft-only replies by default (set `HELPSCOUT_ALLOW_SEND_REPLY=true` to allow published replies)
- Optional message content redaction via `REDACT_MESSAGE_CONTENT`
- Comprehensive audit logging
- Rate limiting with automatic retry

app_id.title: Help Scout App ID
app_id.description: Your OAuth2 App ID from Help Scout My Apps

app_secret.title: Help Scout App Secret
app_secret.description: Your OAuth2 App Secret from Help Scout My Apps

redact_message_content.title: Redact Message Content
redact_message_content.description: Hide message bodies in responses for privacy

cache_ttl.title: Cache TTL (seconds)
cache_ttl.description: How long to cache API responses

reply_spacing.title: Reply Paragraph Spacing
reply_spacing.description: How to space paragraphs around block elements in replies. 'relaxed' adds extra breathing room; 'compact' uses tighter spacing.

allow_send_reply.title: Allow Sending Published Replies
allow_send_reply.description: When false (default), only draft replies can be created. Set to true to allow sending published (non-draft) replies.

prompts.name: summarize-latest-tickets
prompts.text: Use searchConversations with includeTranscripts: true to get the latest tickets with inline message transcripts, then summarize the key themes and issues.

prompts.name: search-last-7-days
prompts.description: Find recent conversations from the last 7 days
prompts.text:
To search for conversations from the last 7 days:
1. Use getServerTime tool to get current timestamp
2. Calculate date 7 days ago
3. Use searchConversations with createdAfter parameter
4. Optionally get details with getConversationSummary or getThreads

prompts.name: find-urgent-tags
prompts.text:
To find urgent conversations:
1. Use getServerTime tool
2. Search for conversations with tags like 'urgent', 'priority', 'high-priority', 'critical'
3. Use searchConversations tool with tag parameter
4. Consider using getConversationSummary for quick assessment

prompts.name: list-inbox-activity
prompts.text:
To monitor inbox activity:
1. Use getServerTime tool
2. Calculate timestamp N hours ago
3. Use searchConversations with inboxId and createdAfter
4. Analyze results for activity patterns and status breakdown
